thread.title: PREVIEW: Aaron Parks, Turner Sims, Southampton
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: Aaron Parks, Turner Sims, Southampton

title: PREVIEW: Aaron Parks, Turner Sims, Southampton
text:
0 comments 
TURNER Sims Jazz Series kicks off with top quality piano trio from New York based Aaron Parks on Tuesday. 
Aaron Parks is a leading voice in the new generation of jazz pianists and composers to come out of New York. 
As an ECM artist he will be joined 
here in their first UK tour by two other formidable players from that label, the in-demand bassist Ben Street and the iconic and masterful drummer 
Billy Hart whose rich history stretches back to Miles Davis and includes stints with Wes Montgomery, Herbie Hancock and McCoy Tyner and many Share article 
Tickets: 023 8059 5151 or turnersims.co.uk Promoted Stories PREVIEW: Aaron Parks, Turner Sims, Southampton Sorry, an error occurred.
